mapper.insert: insert into user_info(user_email, user_password, user_image) values(#{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userImage})
mapper.select: select count(*) from favorites_info where user_email = #{userEmail} and favorites = 'T'
select count(*) from favorites_info where user_email = #{userEmail} and interest = 'T'

select review_num, review_content, review_time, review_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_image, webtoon_title from review_info, webtoon_info where user_email = #{userEmail} and review_info.webtoon_num = webtoon_info.webtoon_num order by review_num desc
